review: don't wnna go into  technical excellence, cinematic nuances  or any other  matter... the noblest part of d film lies in the wake of the movie,when the director n the producer as   well, pay their tribute to the forgotten souls  by showing their individual photographs one after another... pranam to all of them n respect 4 mr. gowarikar for putting enough honesty n sincerity while making such a film that deals wd d most sensitive part of our history

this is a great movie. it shows that there was not a single revolutionary and martyr in british india just like bhagat singh like . there was a lot of revolutionaries that fought for india. movie is based on the mission leaded by surya sen in chittagong (bengal). mustwatch movie for you if you like patriotic movies.

i think this is a tribute to our real sahid.it always bow downs my head with respect.they are our real heroes and heroines who brought the our dream,freedom in our india.
